sentence.Network_en: She became even more exigent over his pronunciation.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对他的发音更为苛求了。

sentence.Network_en: With the development of automobile industry, the requirements for automobile have exigent.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着汽车工业的发展, 对汽车的要求越来越高.

sentence.Network_en: The removal of heavy metals sewage sludges is a problem that is exigent to be solved.
sentence.Network_cn: 重金属的去除是污水污泥处理中亟待解决的问题.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语重要词根 - 豆丁网 ... exigency n. [紧急情况], exigent a. [紧急的], prodigal a. [浪费,挥霍的] 以.
十八级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... exhume v. 掘出， 发掘 exigent a. 紧急的, 迫切的, 苛求的 exorcize v. 驱魔， 去除(坏念头等).
英语学习资料收集 ... Dilatory dilatoriness 拖拉的紧急的 Exigent 迫切的迟缓，缓慢的 Filibuster 敏捷，迅速的.
GRE E flashcards | Quizlet ... EXHORT v.力劝，勉励 EXIGENT a.需要立即采取行动的 EXISTENTIAL a.有关存在的，存在主义的.

list.abs: exigent repairing technique of spoil railway communication cable ., 铁路通信缆损坏的紧急修复技术研究.
example 2 : the drought made water an exigent concern for the regional government .干旱使水成为该地区政府的紧迫问题。
commercial banking in normal times is profitable . in exigent circumstances additional capital is needed .商业银行业在正常时期具有盈利能力，在危急时期则需要额外资本。
so it is a important and exigent problem to estimate the software project's size .因此对软件项目如何进行准确的规模评估研究是一个重要而迫切的问题。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin exigent- 'completing, ascertaining', from the verb exigere (see exact)

sentences.sentence: "regarded literary questions as exigent and momentous"- H.L.Mencken

auth_sentence.content: The daily morning classes that every professional dancer must take are at once languid and exigent.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The daily morning classes that every professional dancer must take are at once languid and exigent.

auth_sentence.content: The lawsuit adds a powerfully exigent dimension to the issues we touched on last week.
auth_sentence.res_content: The lawsuit adds a powerfully exigent dimension to the issues we touched on last week.
